article.title: Study of the PeV Neutrino, $γ$-rays and UHECRs around The Lobes of Centaurus A

multiple_choice_question.text: What type of neutrino has the highest effective area for detection at an energy of 10^6 GeV?
choices: All three types have similar effective areas.

multiple_choice_question.text: Which UHECR nucleus has the shortest mean free path for energy loss due to interactions with CMB photons at an energy of 0.8 x 10^20 eV?
What type of emission is used to describe the WMAP data in this figure?
choices: Inverse Compton scattering with CMB photons
Inverse Compton scattering with EBL photons

multiple_choice_question.text: According to this figure, how many UHECR events are spatially correlated with the IC35 neutrino event within a 15° radius?
